alert.note: Alert for Clark; Codington; Day; Grant; Hamlin; Marshall; Roberts (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 14 at 12:25PM MDT until April 14 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of snow and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility to near quarter mile at times when snow is falling, especially across the Sisseton Hills. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will slowly diminish this evening and snow will be ending late this afternoon into the early evening hours.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. If you happen to get into an area with significant reductions in visibility slow down, turn on your headlights and hazard lights, and allow plenty of distance between you and the car in front of you. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
